CO'TK99G0000164CFY00000: Software, R&D, and Fixed Investment excluding Land Purchasing Expenses/Year-to-year Percent Change/Fiscal Year/All Enterprises/All industries/Actual result
TANKAN/Annual Projections/Software, R&D, and Fixed Investment (Compiled under the New Lease Accounting Standard)

FF'FOF_FFYS430A100: Data up until fiscal year 2003 are based on the 1993SNA. Data from fiscal year 2004 onward are based on the 2008SNA.
FF'FOF_FFYS430A300: Data up until fiscal year 2003 are based on the 1993SNA and calculated by the formula; Securities other than shares - Investment trust beneficiary certificates. Data from fiscal year 2004 onward are based on the 2008SNA.
FF'FOF_FFYS430A330: Data up until fiscal year 2003 are based on the 1993SNA. Data from fiscal year 2004 onward are based on the 2008SNA. There is a discontinuity in the data series between fiscal year 2003 and fiscal year 2004.
FF'FOF_FFYS430A400: Data up until fiscal year 2003 are those of Insurance and pension reserves based on the 1993SNA. Data from fiscal year 2004 onward are based on the 2008SNA. There is a discontinuity in the data series between fiscal year 2003 and fiscal year 2004 due to changes in the compilation methods of pension entitlements, insurance, etc.
FF'FOF_FFYS430A600: Data up until fiscal year 2003 are based on the 1993SNA. Data from fiscal year 2004 onward are based on the 2008SNA. There is a discontinuity in the data series between fiscal year 2003 and fiscal year 2004 due to changes in the compilation methods of pension entitlements, etc.
